com.qualcomm.toq.smartwatch.api.v1.deckofcards
Interface DeckOfCardsEventListener

public interface DeckOfCardsEventListener

Listener for individual card events triggered when a user interacts with a card, either in a deck of cards applet or a notification pop-up on the Toq smartwatch.

A Card must be subscribed to receive its card lifecycle and contextual menu events, by setting Card.setReceivingEvents(true). An implementation of this listener must be registered with the DeckOfCardsManager to propagate events back to the client.

In the case of an event from a card in a deck of cards applet, the card id will relate to a specific card in the DeckOfCards. If the event is from a notification pop-up card, the card id will be the value of NotificationTextCard.ID.

Author:
mcaunter
See Also:
Card, NotificationTextCard
